Articles.Content: Hello I am new to the fourms. As you can see I have registerd but every time I click on a link to download a ship I just gety bounced back to the main forums....

Hi appleiiguy, unfortunately the move from Simple Machines to vBulletin has broken all the old links, until the creator of the links repairs them we are all forced to rely on the Search function, so if you know the name of the craft you want you'll have to try searching for its thread directly.

Links to attachments made before the switch to vBulletin last week will be broken. You might want to PM the creator of the ship and ask them to relink it.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Thanks guys I thought it was a problem on my side..
